articles.title: Exiled due to Soviet rule, how is Milan Kundera relevant today? - Mint
articles.description: Milan Kundera, the renowned Czech writer, passed away at the age of 94. Known for his novels that explored identity and political power, Kundera's work illuminated the complexities of life with irony and intellectual rigor.
